unnormalised: Crop insurance, eh? Good thinking for farmers facing unpredictable monsoons, especially here in Maharashtra. Heard about some chaps in Andhra Pradesh struggling despite PMFBY. Bureaucracy, babu, bureaucracy! Needs to be simpler, like getting biryani on Onam! Rs. 5000/acre compensation sounds good, but is it enough when hailstorms wreck everything near Nashik, 20 km away? Jai Kisan!
normalised: Crop insurance, eh? Good thinking for farmers facing unpredictable monsoons, especially here in Maharashtra. Heard about some chaps in Andhra Pradesh struggling despite P M F B Y. Bureaucracy, babu, bureaucracy! Needs to be simpler, like getting biryani on Onam! Rupee five thousand per acre compensation sounds good, but is it enough when hailstorms wreck everything near Nashik, twenty kilometer away? Jai Kisan!
